Bash(git -C "d:\\workspace\\spark-prototype" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit with registration button

Set up React + Vite project with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui.
Added a centered registration button on the main page.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add registration flow with multi-step dialog popups

Register button now opens an animated dialog prompting users to choose
between Institutional Partners or Beneficiaries, each leading to a
second dialog with specific partner/beneficiary types in a 2-column
grid layout with relevant icons.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
